title: Jogo da memória
description: Jogo da memória, a simple memory game about my girlfriend and me, just with pure Javascript, HTML and CSS.

title: Felicidade Clandestina

title: Hidrocarbonetos
description: A simple application that I developed in the technical course that renders image names of hydrocarbon molecules based on information that the user fills in, all with pure Javascript.
